text: I SEE A HUNDRED THOUSAND PEOPLE, he said, "let's have a look at him like a witch, you look very flushed." #SmallGods

passages.fragment: I SEE A HUNDRED THOUSAND PEOPLE , he said ,
passages.full_quote: <used>I SEE A HUNDRED THOUSAND PEOPLE, he said, s</used>winging himself into the saddle
Aloud, <used>he said, "W</used>ell, Chief Constable Upshot, I am Sir Samuel Vimes, amongst other things, and I was thinking only just now that I should talk to you."
"Come on," she <used>said, "let's have a look</used> around!"
"Now, <used>let's have a look at</used> this thing."

passages.fragment: have a look at him like a witch ,
passages.full_quote: "Next time you <used>have a look at him like a witch, n</used>ot like a woman," said Nanny, and gave Magrat a conspiratorial nudge

passages.fragment: like a witch , you look very
passages.full_quote: "You don't look <used>like a witch, you look very</used>, that is..." He blushed
You know<used>, you look very flushed</used>
